description: Golden reference for project config detection â€” The Mariner screenplay

format.note: Complete short film: FADE IN to CUT TO BLACK, ~10-15 formatted pages, single-night single-location story with full narrative arc. Not a feature film excerpt.

tone.note: Screenplay has clear dark/gritty/violent tone plus dystopian setting, fast pacing, and suspense. Raising minimum to 3 since all models should identify multiple tonal qualities.

estimated_duration_minutes.note: Complete short film at ~10-15 formatted pages = ~10-15 min screen time. Up to 30-35 min if action sequences play long. Models estimating 90+ min are treating this as a feature excerpt, which is wrong.

supporting_characters.note: Removed CONSIGLIERE and GIRL (don't exist in screenplay). Added MIKEY, CARLOS, ROSCO (all have dialogue). Raised min to 3 since there are 6 clear supporting characters.
